model

Class BallWorldModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.BallWorldModel

  • public class BallWorldModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the BallWorldModel class, which makes balls, clears balls, and updates the balls.
    Author:
    sn32, kyl3, lka2, swong

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IModel2ViewAdapter adapter
      This is the adapter which has functions that the model wants the view to do.
      private Dispatcher dispatcher
      This is an instance of a simplified Observable class that immediately notifies its Observers when its notifyAll() method is called.
      private javax.swing.Timer timer
      This is a timer that says what action to perform every timeSlice number of ms.
      private int timeSlice
      This is how often we want to update.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BallWorldModel(IModel2ViewAdapter adapter)
      This is the BallWorldModel constructor, which creates a model for the controller to interact with.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearBalls()
      This function clears all the balls from the canvas, by removing them as observers.

      Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IStrategyFac objects.

      This function takes the input and confirms it to the required model.ClassStrategy format for dynamic class loading.

      This function "fixes" the type passed in to create an IPaintStrategy.
      IStrategyFac getSwitcherFac()
      This function returns a strategy factory, which makes the current switcher balls' update strategy
      IPaintStrategy loadPaintStrat(java.lang.String strat)
      This function loads an instance of an IPaintStrategy, given a classname.
      IUpdateStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String strat)
      This function takes an input string and loads the associated IUpdateStrategy, and returns the error strategy if the strategy isn't available.
      void makeBall(IUpdateStrategy make, IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
      This function randomizes parameters for the ball, and makes a ball with the parameter's update strategy.
      IStrategyFac makePaintFactory(java.lang.String text)
      This function returns an IStrategyFac to allow the Paint Strategies to be made later on.
      IStrategyFac makeStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
      This takes a class name, and creates a strategy factory for it, by loading the strategy and returning it in the make method.
      void setSwitcherStrategy(IStrategyFac switchFac)
      This function sets the switcher balls strategy to the one made by the input.
      void start()
      This function starts the timer.
      void update(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This function updates all the balls by notifying them using the dispatcher and an IBallCmd

      • clearBalls

        public void clearBalls()
        This function clears all the balls from the canvas, by removing them as observers.

      • start

        public void start()
        This function starts the timer.

      • update

        public void update(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This function updates all the balls by notifying them using the dispatcher and an IBallCmd
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object to paint on.

      • loadStrategy

        public IUpdateStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String strat)
        This function takes an input string and loads the associated IUpdateStrategy, and returns the error strategy if the strategy isn't available.
        Parameters:
        strat - A string of the strategy to be created.
        Returns:
        The IUpdateStrategy associated with the string, or the error strategy if there is no associated strategy.

      • fixName

        public java.lang.String fixName(java.lang.String classname)
        This function takes the input and confirms it to the required model.ClassStrategy format for dynamic class loading.
        Parameters:
        classname - The string that should be modified to conform to the model.ClassStrategy format.
        Returns:
        The class string in a model.ClassStrategy format.

      • makeStrategyFac

        public IStrategyFac makeStrategyFac(java.lang.String classname)
        This takes a class name, and creates a strategy factory for it, by loading the strategy and returning it in the make method.
        Parameters:
        classname - The class of strategy to make.
        Returns:
        An IStrategyFac whose make function calls the associated model.ClassStrategy.

      • makeBall

        public void makeBall(IUpdateStrategy make,
                     IPaintStrategy paintStrat)
        This function randomizes parameters for the ball, and makes a ball with the parameter's update strategy.
        Parameters:
        make - The IUpdateStrategy that determines how the ball updates.
        paintStrat - The IPaintStrategy that determines how to paint the ball

      • combineStrategyFacs

        public IStrategyFac combineStrategyFacs(IStrategyFac stratFac1,
                                        IStrategyFac stratFac2)
        Returns an IStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IStrategyFac objects. Returns null if either supplied factory is null. The toString() of the returned factory is the toString()'s of the two given factories, concatenated with "-". If either factory is null, then a factory for a beeping error strategy is returned.
        Parameters:
        stratFac1 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        stratFac2 - An IStrategyFac for a strategy
        Returns:
        An IStrategyFac for the composition of the two strategies

      • setSwitcherStrategy

        public void setSwitcherStrategy(IStrategyFac switchFac)
        This function sets the switcher balls strategy to the one made by the input.
        Parameters:
        switchFac - IStrategyFac which makes the new update strategy for the switcher balls.

      • getSwitcherFac

        public IStrategyFac getSwitcherFac()
        This function returns a strategy factory, which makes the current switcher balls' update strategy
        Returns:
        An IStrategyFac, which makes the current strategy for the switcher balls.

      • makePaintFactory

        public IStrategyFac makePaintFactory(java.lang.String text)
        This function returns an IStrategyFac to allow the Paint Strategies to be made later on.
        Parameters:
        text - The type of paint strategy.
        Returns:
        An IStrategyFac

      • loadPaintStrat

        public IPaintStrategy loadPaintStrat(java.lang.String strat)
        This function loads an instance of an IPaintStrategy, given a classname.
        Parameters:
        strat - The type of paint strategy.
        Returns:
        An IPaintStrategy

      • fixPaintName

        public java.lang.String fixPaintName(java.lang.String classname)
        This function "fixes" the type passed in to create an IPaintStrategy.
        Parameters:
        classname - The type of paint strategy to create.
        Returns:
        The fixed paint strategy information as a string.
